job_desc: Responsibilities :; Design, build, and maintain the company’s source of truth (data lake, data warehouse, and data mart), dashboarding/reporting platforms, and/or any other data products; Work closely with BI analysts and data scientists to implement a variety of descriptive and predictive analytic solutions; Work closely with the product and engineering team to ensure the data ecosystem quality and accountability; Requirements :; Candidate must possess at least bachelor degree in Computer Science or Information Technology; At least 1-2 years of experience as data engineer (have experience data science course online school); Proficient with a variety of data engineering ETL Tools (Pentaho, Talend, SSIS, etc); Good understanding of the basics of data pipeline, and experience in implementing data-lake/data-warehouse/data-mart, with most recent data tech-stacks; Firm grasp in SQL Queries.

Description:; About your responsibilities for the Role; Provision, configure and maintain infrastructure on cloud services; Design infrastructure architecture and implement it based on the client’s functional and non-functional requirements list.; Responds to incidents, and problems planning for growth.; Design and implement CI/CD pipeline.; Work with the development team to quickly deliver software.; Design and implement automation for infrastructure and code management.; Requirements:; What you need to have (Minimum Qualifications); Excellent knowledge of Cloud Services such as AWS, GCP, Azure, and Alibaba Cloud.; Excellent knowledge of IaC platforms such as Terraform, Pulumi, and AWS CDK.; Excellent knowledge of Linux administration.; Excellent knowledge in the administration of relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MariaDB.; Experience in designing and implementing computer networks and cloud security.; Excellent knowledge of CI/CD tools such as AWS Codepipeline, Gitlab CI, and Jenkins.; Excellent knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes; Excellent knowledge of using Git.; Working knowledge in Public Key Infrastructure system.; Experience in monitoring and logging such as GCP Stackdriver logging, AWS Cloudwatch, Grafana, and ELK.; Working knowledge of one or more of these programming languages: Go, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript.; Able to work as part of a team and or alone.; Can efficiently organize and prioritize tasks.; Can confidently identify and solve technical problems unaided and in a timely fashion.; Required language(s): English; Preferred:; What would make you stand out from the crowd (Preferred Qualifications); Knowledge of cybersecurity.; Able to design microservice architecture while considering the operation, security, and availability aspect.; .

[Hiring] Cloud DevOps Engineer – Technology Industry; 📍 Location: Jakarta; 🏢 Placement: Our Client (Technology Industry); 🕒 Employment: Full-time; We are hiring a Cloud DevOps Engineer for a leading technology company based in Jakarta. If you are passionate about cloud infrastructure, automation, and DevOps best practices, this is a great opportunity to grow your career in a highly innovative environment.; 🌐 Job Responsibilities:; Provision, configure, and maintain cloud infrastructure services.; Design infrastructure architecture based on functional and non-functional client requirements.; Respond to incidents, resolve problems, and plan for infrastructure scalability.; Design and implement CI/CD pipelines.; Collaborate with development teams to enable rapid and reliable software delivery.; Build automation for infrastructure and code management.; ✅ Requirements:; Strong knowledge in one or more cloud platforms: AWS, GCP, or Azure.; Proficient in Docker and Kubernetes.; Skilled in Git and version control best practices.; Hands-on experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, Pulumi, or AWS CDK.; Familiarity with one or more programming languages: Go, Python, TypeScript.; Solid experience in Linux system administration.; Knowledge in managing relational databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB.; Experience with CI/CD tools such as AWS CodePipeline, GitLab CI, Jenkins.; Understanding of Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) systems.; Proficient in English (spoken and written).; 🚀 Why Join?; Be part of a growing and forward-thinking tech company.; Work on impactful projects with modern cloud technologies.; Collaborative, open, and innovation-driven work culture.; Competitive compensation and career development opportunities.

Key Responsibilities:; Receive and monitor alerts/information from AWS services (e.g., CloudWatch, SNS, etc.); Perform initial identification and assessment of issues within the AWS environment; Accurately document incidents in ticketing systems (e.g., Jira, Freshdesk, ServiceNow); Communicate directly with internal teams or third-party vendors regarding incidents; Escalate issues in a structured and timely manner to the L1 team for technical investigation; Ensure communication and escalation processes are aligned with defined SLAs (Service Level Agreements); Provide initial incident reports or status updates to relevant stakeholders; Assist in maintaining SOPs/runbooks related to L0 support activities; Qualifications:; 0–1 year of experience in IT or cloud operations (fresh graduates are welcome); Holds an AWS Associate certification (Practioner, Solutions Architect, SysOps Administrator, or Developer); Familiar with core AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, IAM, and CloudWatch; Able to read and interpret basic logs from the AWS Console; Strong communication skills, detail-oriented, and responsive to incidents; Willing to work in a shift-based schedule if required

Job Description; Establish data engineering frameworks, standards, and guidelines; Design, develop, and maintain efficient and scalable data pipelines; Optimize pipeline performance to reduce latency and improve efficiency; Build and manage scalable, secure, and reliable data storage systems; Provide technical guidance and support to engineering teams; Promote collaboration among teams involved in data initiatives; Ensure compliance with data privacy, security, retention, and disposal regulations; Qualification; Min 4 years of experience in data engineering; Advanced proficiency in SQL and experience with PostgreSQL, MSSQL, or BigQuery; Hands-on experience with ETL tools such as Pentaho, Apache Airflow, Prefect, or dbt; Proficient in Python programming; Experience with cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, Azure); Solid understanding of data warehousing and data modelling concepts; Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail; Proven experience in leading and managing a team.; Key Competencies:; SQL; ETL (Extract-Transform-Load); Database and Data Warehouse; Programming Languages (Python, Java, Scala); Cloud Technologies (GCP, AWS, Azure); Data Modelling; BI Tools (Tableau, Power BI)

Job Descriptions:; Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture for report, business intelligence (BI) dashboard.; Create report and business intelligence (BI) dashboard need by organization.; Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery that needed by BI and reporting services; Create the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and big data technologies.; Create analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.; Create data tools for analytics in building and optimizing reporting services.; Ensure the effectiveness and efficiency of operational database system.; Monitor database & system operational activities in Bina Nusantara.; Maintain data security and accuracy in Bina Nusantara; Provide excellent service towards users, in relation to database authorization, change and withdrawal (web & workgroup); ; Requirements :; Minimum Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related field; Had experience 2 years as Data Analyst or related field is a plus; Understanding of structured query language (SQL); Demonstrated experience with BI Tools (Tableau, Power BI, OBIEE, Qlikview).; Experience interpreting data and analyzing results using statistical techniques; Experience presenting findings to business partners across the organization, including executive leadership; Experience with database software/web applications; Strong analytical and organisational skills; Ability to work well in a fast paced environment, where the technology is constantly changing

This job position is suitable for individuals who are constant learners, problem solvers and multi-taskers. Candidates who thrive in a fast-paced environment, steps up to face challenges, and are able to deliver results, are welcome to apply. We are looking for candidates who are interested in doing Implementation and Operation for Cloud Infrastructure.  ; Responsibilities  ; Responsible for Implementing and/or Maintaining cloud infrastructure in AWS, Azure and Google Cloud for Xtremax Customer  ; Provide support related to customer issue with the Cloud Infrastructure.  ; Work closely with IT security to monitor privacy and develop incident-response procedures; Requirements; Qualifications:; Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.; Has minimum 2 years experience working with AWS services and architecture.; Proven experience in:; Writing infrastructure code using Terraform.; Site Reliability Engineering practices and incident management.; Building and managing both Windows and Linux servers in cloud environments.; Managing Kubernetes clusters in production environments.; Strong scripting and automation skills (e.g., Python, Bash and PowerShell).; Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and version control systems (e.g., Git).; Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.; Strong communication and collaboration skills; Preferred Qualifications:; AWS Certified (AWS Solutions Architect, AWS SysOps Engineer).; Experience with other cloud providers (e.g., Azure, Google Cloud Platform).; Knowledge of other Infrastructure as Code tools (e.g., Terraform, Terragrunt).; Familiarity with containerization technologies other than Kubernetes (e.g., Docker).

Job Description; Bertanggung jawab dalam membangun dan memelihara sistem data-platform, mulai dari tahapan proses pengumpulan data dari berbagai data-source (extract), data-cleansing (data quality) dan data transformasi (transform). Data-Platform sebagai tools memberikan insight kepada pengguna dalam melakukan pengambilan keputusan operasional maupun keputusan strategi.; Mengekstrak, mengubah, dan memuat (ETL) data dari berbagai sumber termasuk basis data, API, dan berkas log; Menerapkan pemeriksaan kualitas data dan sistem pemantauan untuk memastikan keakuratan dan konsistensi data; Mengembangkan dan memelihara model data dan data warehouse; Berkolaborasi dengan business-analyst untuk memahami kebutuhan data mereka dan menerjemahkannya menjadi technical-specification; Menganalisa dan melakukan perubahaan terhadap sistem data-platform untuk perbaikan system-error, pemeliharaan dan pengembangan; Menjaga kualitas sistem yang dihasilkan dengan mempertimbangkan user-friend, user-experience, speed performance dan system reliability; Melakukan test terhadap hasil pengembangan/pemeliharaan; Bertanggung jawab atas pengembangan dan pemeliharaan peranti lunak sesuai dengan objektif perusahaan dan kebutuhan pengguna; Qualification:; Berpengalaman min. 2 tahun bekerja sebagai ETL Developer mengembangkan memelihara dan mengelola RDBMS termasuk pembuatan script, store-procedure dan SQL Query; Membuat dan memelihara data pipeline architecture yang optimal untuk integrasi data menggunakan ETL tools seperti SSIS, Pentaho dan Talend; Build data ingestion workflow for data warehouse/data marts/operational data store7; Pengetahuan dan pengalaman terhadap data-warehouse, data-marts, operational-data-store dan master data management; Pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam database-design dan membangun database; Pengetahuan dan pengalaman dalam pembuatan SQL script dan tuning SQL yang baik

Requirements:; Minimum 1 year of experience as a Data Engineer.; Proven experience with ETL tool setup and usage, especially Informatica; Talend is a plus.; Experience in building and maintaining data warehouses.; Solid understanding of ELT/ETL concepts, data integration, and data modeling.; Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Alibaba Cloud, etc.; Strong skills in SQL and relational databases.; Self-driven with good problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and in a team environment.; Willing to work in 24x7 rotating shifts including weekends and holidays.; Job desc:; Install, configure, and maintain ETL tools, primarily Informatica (preferred) or Talend.; Design and develop scalable ELT/ETL pipelines to support data integration and transformation.; Build and manage data warehouse infrastructure and architecture.; Monitor and optimize data pipeline performance and reliability.; Collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and business teams to deliver efficient data solutions.; Document data architectures, pipelines, and processes.

Responsibilities :; Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture; Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.; Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.;  Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and On-prem/ Cloud technologies.; Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics; Qualifications :; 2-4 years of experience as a data engineer.; Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.; ETL tools knowledge is required.; Experience building and optimizing big data pipelines, architectures and data sets.; Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.;  Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.; Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.; A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.

Job Description; Core Banking Migration: Participating in the migration of core banking systems.; Reconciliation of Core Banking Migration Results: Ensuring the accuracy and consistency of data after core banking migrations.; ETL DWH Migration: Assisting with the migration of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for the Data Warehouse.; Regulator Report: Contributing to the generation of reports required by regulators.; Transaction Reconciliation: Performing reconciliation of transactions.; Code Analysis and Workflow Design: Being able to analyze problems and read code, as well as designing workflows using flowcharts.; ETL Tools and Database Understanding: Mastering ETL tools and demonstrating a strong understanding of databases.; Programming: Applying knowledge of one or more programming languages.; Job Qualifications; Education: Minimum D3 (Diploma Three), preferably S1 (Bachelor's degree), or equivalent from any major with experience in the IT field.; Work Experience: Minimum 1 - 5 years of experience in the relevant field.; General Knowledge: Understanding of general banking flow.; Ability to analyze problems and read code.; Ability to design workflows using flowcharts.; Technical Skills (Skillset): Databases and Data Management: Proficiency in SQL, Data Warehouse concepts, MySQL/Postgres/MS SQL, Oracle, DB2, and Big Data technologies.; ETL Tools: Mastery of ETL tools such as ODI, IBM DataStage, Talend, or Pentaho.; Programming Languages: Knowledge of one or more programming languages, with PHP specifically mentioned.; Other Technologies: Familiarity with SOA, ISO 8583, SOAP Web Service, and API.

Overview; Why Microsoft :; Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.;  The Purpose Of This Role:; The main goal of Microsoft Solution Engineer (SE) is to win the technical decision of customers to purchase and use our technology. The SE is expected to be able to both own and win customers’ technical decisions, as well as find new opportunities through their contacts and engagements for sales specialists to pursue. As a SE, you work within a virtual team of technical, partner and consulting resources to help educate your customers at a technical level, demonstrate, and prove our solutions, and win the technical decision, allowing the team to achieve/exceed quarterly sales targets in your accounts. Being part of this team will allow you to maintain and develop your deep technical expertise across Microsoft and non-Microsoft cloud-based technologies.; ; Proven track record of building deep technical relationships with senior executives. Experience in managing various stakeholder relationships to get consensus on solution/projects. The ability to influence and build relationships across technical and business teams. Demonstrates executive presence, presentation skills, deep technical product demo abilities, written and verbal communication skills. Works cohesively with customers, the Microsoft account team, and Microsoft partners. Helps others succeed by identifying and promoting solutions and strategies. Experience in creating Proof of Concepts (PoCs), Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for customers that lead to production deployments.;  The Impact You’ll Be Making:; As a Cloud & AI Solution Engineer for the Azure Platform, you will play a key role in helping customers modernize their infrastructure and unlock the full value of Microsoft’s cloud. You will work directly with technical and business stakeholders to design and implement secure, scalable, and resilient architectures that support AI workloads and business-critical applications. ; You bring deep expertise in migrating core workloads—including Windows, SQL Server, Linux, PostgreSQL, and Oracle—to Azure. Beyond migration, you lead customers through modernization using the 6R strategy, containerization best practices, and Azure-native services like AKS and Arc, while exploring how AI and intelligent agents can accelerate legacy transformation.  ; You also apply strong networking knowledge to design hybrid and cloud-native solutions, including virtual networks, VPNs, and secure routing architectures that meet enterprise performance and compliance needs. You complement this with trusted partner solutions like NetApp, VMware, RedHat, and SAP to ensure a secure, optimized, and scalable migration experience. ; As you join the team, You will have the opportunity to grow your technical expertise with access to a wide range of Microsoft learning resources—including support for earning industry-recognized certifications across Azure infrastructure, security, and AI. ;  ; With a solid understanding of Azure security services and compliance frameworks you will help customers meet regulatory requirements and build Cloud environments that are ready for the future. ; Qualifications; Required Qualification:; 6+ years technical pre-sales or technical consulting experience; OR Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field AND 4+ years technical pre-sales or technical consulting experience; OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field AND 3+ year(s) technical pre-sales or technical consulting experience; OR equivalent experience; Proven experience in cloud infrastructure, including migration of workloads such as Windows, SQL, Linux, and PostgreSQL.; Experience designing or selling solutions involving hybrid networking, secure connectivity, or network performance optimization in enterprise environments.; Hands-on experience with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), App Platform, and containerization strategies.; Strong understanding of Azure services, including security, compliance, and hybrid cloud scenarios.; Ability to engage technical and business stakeholders to design and deploy scalable, secure cloud solutions. ;  Preferred Qualifications:; 6+ years technical pre-sales, technical consulting, or technology delivery, or related experience; OR equivalent experience; 4+ years experience with cloud and hybrid, or on premises infrastructure, architecture designs, migrations, industry standards, and/or technology management; Familiarity with enterprise platforms such as SAP, Oracle, and ISVs like NetApp, VMware, and RedHat.; Knowledge of regulatory frameworks such as GDPR, HIPAA, and Public Sector compliance standards. ; Responsibilities; Drive technical sales by using technical demos, proofs of concept, and technical architecture accelerators to influence solution design and enable deployments.; Lead architecture sessions and technical workshops to accelerate Azure adoption.; Build trusted relationships with platforms leads to co-design secure, scalable solutions.; Resolve technical blockers by collaborating with engineering and sharing customer insights.; Maintain expertise in cloud migration (Windows, SQL, Linux, PostgreSQL, app workloads), resiliency, security, and compliance.; Deepen knowledge of enterprise apps (SAP, Oracle) and Azure VMware Solution (AVS).; Represent Microsoft in customer forums and technical communities through thought leadership.

We are looking for Data Engineer to be part of our IT Business Insight and Analytics Team.; Job Description:; Mining data from primary and secondary sources, then reorganizing said data in a format that can be used by next process such as data analytics, data science or any AI/ML processes; Manage day-to-day operation in collecting, storing, processing and analyzing huge sets of data including construct data storages and data-access tools (data lake approach); Monitor overal performance and stability of the system, warehouse cleansing and ensure track pipeline stability; Job Requirements:; Have at least 7-12 years of experience in data lake implementation; Experience on design & setup data lake architecture, topology, and infrastructure; Experience with ETL and ELT data pipeline hands-on & implementation; Proficient with data lake related skills, such as : Cloudera, Dataiku, Object Storage, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Airflow,Dremio, Python, R, Docker, Kubernetes, Iceberg/HUDI, etc; Good & have passion on data processing; Working location: Serpong

About the Role As Sr. Data Engineer for our global Data Enrichment squad, you will be responsible for implementing data flows using Apache Airflow and AWS, incorporating functionalities such as external API’s, AI/ML components, and GenAI. You will work in close collaboration with your ETL Lead and Product Owner to translate the requirements of our customers and stakeholders to ETL data flow features and then build and run them. You improve the operations of the ETL data flows by improving our monitoring capabilities, automated error recovery, and scalability.; Responsibilities:; ● Develop and maintain ETL workflows using Apache Airflow and AWS services.; ● Take ownership of complex ETL tasks and AWS Lambda functions.; ● Design ETL pipelines and review work from junior team members.; ● Contribute to building secure and scalable data solutions.; ● Operate and monitor data flows in production environments, supporting junior colleagues as needed.; ● Improve the resilience, reliability, and performance of ETL systems.; ● Automate recurring operations and optimize performance.; ● Guide junior team members in testing practices and setting up automated tests.; ● Promote and model best practices for documentation across the team.; Requirements:; ● 5+ years of experience as a full-time Data Engineer; ● Hands-on experience delivering projects using Apache Airflow in the past 2 years.; ● Proficiency with AWS; ● Experience with PostgreSQL and/or OpenSearch.; ● Strong SQL skills demonstrated through past roles and projects.; ● Experience implementing and improving CI/CD pipelines for ETL processes.; ● Solid understanding and several years of experience working with Python in a production environment.

Job Description:; - Develop and maintain enterprise-wide data warehouse architectures and solutions.; - Collaborate with stakeholders to gather business and data requirements.; - Design and implement ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for data integration.; - Ensure data quality, data governance, and compliance with security standards.; - Optimize data storage, query performance, and reporting efficiency.; - Work closely with BI developers, data analysts, and business users to support data-driven decision-making.; - Monitor, troubleshoot, and tune data warehouse systems and processes.; - Document data models, metadata, and data mapping.; Job Requirement:; - Min. experienced 5 years as a system administrator handling Data Warehouse; - Proficient in and understands the use of SSIS as an ETL tool.; - Knowledgeable and experienced in using SQL.; - Proficient in Windows Server OS.; - Proficient in Linux OS.; - Has strong teamwork skills (Team Player).; - Able to communicate effectively.; - Proactive, creative, and highly initiative-driven in performing continuous improvement.; - Willing to be placed in Banking Industry

We are looking for an experienced Cloud Engineer to join our team. If you have excellent skills we would like to meet you. As a Cloud Engineer, you’ll work closely with our engineers to ensure system consistency and improve user experience. ; Job Desc :; Responsible for cloud operational activities, such as the following : Monitoring the platform & infrastructure according to predefined metrics/parameters; Build cloud operational dashboards to visualise platform & Infrastructure health parameters; Responsible for operating and maintaining cloud operational tools, e.g. monitoring tools, cloud operational dashboard; Responsible for developing tools, frameworks, and automation scripts that can improve efficiency in monitoring and managing cloud services.; PT Metrodata Electronics, Tbk (Digital Solution Provider & Technology Innovator) would like to invite you to be part of the company to develop yourself and your skills. If you are: ; Qualification :; Bachelor's Degree Computer Science/Information Technology; At least 3 year(s) of working Cloud management experience; Certification in Google Cloud Architect Professional or AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate or AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate, AWS Advanced Networking-Speciality will be a plus; IT service management certification, such as ITIL will be a plus; At least 5 years of working experience in Information Technology; At least 3 years holding a similar position (IT Operation); At least 2 years' work experience in GCP or AWS cloud operations; If you meet the requirement we needed, let’s apply for the following open positions. ; Metrodata not just offer for the job, we offer you for brighter career future.

Ellipse Projects, with over 10 years of experience, focuses on cutting-edge infrastructure projects tailored to regional needs. Ellipse Group upholds the highest international standards and is committed to social and environmental responsibility in collaboration with financial and industrial partners. We are looking for motivated and skilled candidate for the Position of ICT Cloud Engineer; Responsibilities of the Migration Engineer shall be as follows:;  JOB RESPONSIBILITIES; Design, deploy, securely Data Center migration from existing environment to new environment; Experience in data centers operation and maintenance; Experience in data and application migration solutions tailored to meet Client goals, ensuring compatibility with existing systems and compliance with Technology Security standards.; Ensure cloud environments adhere to best practices for security, data protection, and compliance, including managing access controls and risk assessments.; Work closely with all vendors or subcontractors; Maintain thorough documentation of cloud configurations, processes, and best practices for team reference and compliance purposes.; Provide guidance and support to Client manage service on cloud technologies, assist with troubleshooting, and contribute to knowledge-sharing initiatives.; Stay up to date with industry trends, new tools, and cloud technologies to propose improvements and innovations to the cloud strategy.; ; JOB SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS; Bachelor in information technology or equivalent degree; Experience on Data Center and or Application Migration in private cloud (Certified in VMware cloud foundation or VMware cloud director is a plus); Has knowledge in VMware NSX, SDDC Manager, Aria, vSphere replication, etc.; Background in IP based secure communications systems; High level of fluency in written and spoken English; Demonstrate a great intellectual curiosity with regard to all the technical solutions implemented in and outside our projects; Demonstrate autonomy, good interpersonal skills and natural authority; Management skills and a sense of teamwork; 7 to 10 years of previous experience with an industrial company specialized in Cloud, IT, cybersecurity. Knowledge in the design and implementation of cyber security controls within an ICT architecture, knowledge of security best practice, and CSIRT structures

This position involves creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, enhancing application monitoring and containerization, and strengthening cloud-native deployment. You’ll also build internal automation tools, collaborate with development and infrastructure teams, and participate in the entire delivery lifecycle. Adhering to development standards and addressing daily production issues is essential.; Requirements:; 3+ years of application deployment and operations experience on cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.); Experience creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines; Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, etc.); Working experience with container technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, etc.; Experience with scripting languages such as Python, Bash, etc.; Experience with infrastructure code (Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible, etc.); Advanced troubleshooting skills and problem solving abilities; Communication skills to work collaboratively with team members; Project management skills(optional); Documentation skills; Experience in customer proposal/pre-sale; Experience with AI, ML and data lake implementation(optional); Experience in handling cases in English or Japanese

About the Role; We are seeking a highly skilled Data & Analytics Engineer to drive data-driven decision-making by designing, optimizing, and maintaining scalable data pipelines and analytical solutions. This role involves working with Amazon Athena, MySQL, Google Sheets, and Holistics to manage, analyze, and visualize key business data. You will play a crucial role in building a scalable budget and forecasting tool, integrating transaction data with HubSpot data, and optimizing data workflows to support financial and operational insights.; Key Responsibilities; Data Engineering & Management:; Design and develop SQL-based data pipelines to integrate HubSpot, MySQL transaction data, and Athena.; Develop and optimize queries for Athena (Presto-based SQL) to ensure efficient data retrieval and reporting.; Develop, maintain and enhance data models on dbt to support analytics and reporting needs.; Develop dynamic SQL scripts for extracting and transforming data that support cross functional requirements; Automate data ingestion from various sources, ensuring scalability and maintainability; Data Analytics & Reporting:; Work with Holistics BI to create dashboards and automate reporting using Athena queries.; Ensure data accuracy and consistency by implementing validation and reconciliation processes.; Develop Python scripts for ad-hoc data transformations; Budget & Forecasting Tool Development:; Work on a custom web-based budgeting and forecasting application integrated with Holistics.; Enable input capabilities for budget and forecast data using front-end tools.; Collaborate with stakeholders to define business logic and financial modeling requirements.; Key Skills & Experience Required; Strong expertise in SQL (Athena/Presto, MySQL) for complex queries and performance tuning.; Experience with BI tools (Holistics preferred) for dashboarding and reporting.; Proficiency in Python for data manipulation, automation, and scripting tasks.; Experience with Google Sheets API & Athena integrations.; Ability to translate business requirements into scalable data solutions.; Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.; Nice-to-Have Skills; Experience with cloud-based data lakes (AWS S3, Athena, Glue, etc.).; Familiarity with HubSpot data structures and CRM analytics.; Exposure to web-based data entry tools for budgeting & forecasting solutions..

We think you also hate when travel app is giving you a headache, right? A slight misinformation can ruin the trip.; That is exactly what we are tackling as t-fam! Making sure that our 50+ million users have the best experience in crafting their own adventure.; #LI-EP1; Your main duties in flying with us :; Build and extend our backend code based on SOLID Principle and Clean Code; Build APIs that serve our frontend apps – Benchmark and improve performance; Develop dashboard related frontend; Maintain and extend our test suite; Refactor and improve existing code to incorporate better patterns; Document and write about the work; Create unit test and implement self test to make sure the code is running well; Assist technical lead to review and follow up code that have been developed.; Mandatory belongings that you must prepare :; Bachelor degree or equivalent, preferably in Computer Science/Information Technology; Min. 3 years of working experience as Software Engineer or equivalent; Knows how to analyze log; Experience working with System Design; Experienced in using Golang (Mandatory), NextJs (or any javascript related); Experience working with RDBMS or NoSQL; Experience with Git Flow; Experience with CI/CD, TDD, Refactor/Rewrite system; Experience with Event-Driven Architecture such as Kafka or RabbitMQ; Experience with Kubernetes is a plus; Experience working with Redis and Memcached is a plus; Experience with Elastic Search is a plus; Experience with pair programming is a plus; Experience with Linux syntax, Docker is a plus; Good sense of prioritization and product knowledge/product ownership; Critical thinking, fast learner, and good communication skills; Well-motivated, responsible for the deadline, and can work under pressure; Willingness to work in a hybrid environment (3 days in-office, 2 days remote).

Overview; Why Microsoft :; Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.; The Purpose Of This Role:; The main goal of Microsoft Solution Engineer (SE) is to win the technical decision of customers to purchase and use our technology. The SE is expected to be able to both own and win customers’ technical decisions, as well as find new opportunities through their contacts and engagements for sales specialists to pursue. As a SE, you work within a virtual team of technical, partner and consulting resources to help educate your customers at a technical level, demonstrate, and prove our solutions, and win the technical decision, allowing the team to achieve/exceed quarterly sales targets in your accounts. Being part of this team will allow you to maintain and develop your deep technical expertise across Microsoft and non-Microsoft cloud-based technologies.; Proven track record of building deep technical relationships with senior executives. Experience in managing various stakeholder relationships to get consensus on solution/projects. The ability to influence and build relationships across technical and business teams. Demonstrates executive presence, presentation skills, deep technical product demo abilities, written and verbal communication skills. Works cohesively with customers, the Microsoft account team, and Microsoft partners. Helps others succeed by identifying and promoting innovative solutions and strategies. Experience in creating Proof of Concepts (PoCs), Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for customers that lead to production deployments.; The Impact You’ll Be Making:; As a Cloud & AI Solution Engineer for the Azure platform, you’ll play a key role in helping mid-market customers modernize their infrastructure and unlock the full value of Microsoft’s cloud. You’ll work directly with technical and business stakeholders to design and implement secure, scalable, and resilient architectures that support AI workloads and business-critical applications.; You bring deep expertise in migrating core workloads—including Windows, SQL Server, Linux, PostgreSQL, and Oracle—to Azure. Beyond migration, you lead customers through modernization using the 6R strategy, containerization best practices, and Azure-native services like AKS and Arc, while exploring how AI and intelligent agents can accelerate legacy transformation.; You also apply strong networking knowledge to design hybrid and cloud-native solutions, including virtual networks, VPNs, and secure routing architectures that meet enterprise performance and compliance needs. You complement this with trusted partner solutions like NetApp, VMware, RedHat, and SAP to ensure a secure, optimized, and scalable migration experience.; As you join the team, You will have the opportunity to grow your technical expertise with access to a wide range of Microsoft learning resources—including support for earning industry-recognized certifications across Azure infrastructure, security, and AI.; With a solid understanding of Azure security services and compliance frameworks you will help customers meet regulatory requirements and build Cloud environments that are ready for the future.; Qualifications; Required Qualification:; 6+ years of technical pre-sales or technical consulting experience; OR Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field AND 4+ years of technical pre-sales or technical consulting experience; OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field AND 3+ years of technical pre-sales or technical consulting experience OR equivalent experience; Preferred Qualifications:; Azure Certifications: Microsoft Azure Administrator (AZ-104) or Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions (Exam AZ-305); Deep domain knowledge in Data Center Migration, Windows Server, and SQL Server Migration (including modernization to PaaS), VMware, Networking, Security, Storage, BCDR, Infra as Code, Hybrid and Arc, or hands-on experience working with the respective products at the expert level. Additionally deep knowledge/experience with Azure Migrate and RVTools.; Competitive Landscape: Knowledge of competitor cloud migration platforms, infrastructure and services including hybrid cloud technologies.; Experience creating cloud migration Proof of Concepts (PoC), Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for customers that lead to production deployments.; Excellent Communicator: Demonstrates executive presence, presentation skills, deep technical product demo abilities, written and verbal communication skills.; Collaborative: Works cohesively with customers, the Microsoft account team, and Microsoft partners. Helps others succeed by identifying and promoting innovative solutions and strategies.; Relationship Building: Proven track record of building deep technical relationships with senior executives. Experience in managing various stakeholder relationships to get consensus on solution/projects. The ability to influence and build relationships across technical and business teams.; Responsibilities; Key Responsibilities; Own technical discussions for Azure Migration with customers leveraging processes and tools, demos, and programs; use consultative and/or Challenger method; establish rules of engagement (e.g., role boundaries, handoff strategies) for extended teams.; Build strategy: map the agreed customer vision into a strategy, resolve concerns, preventing, and removing technical blockers, and validating a strong business case for investment and translated technology complexity into business impact. Work with the customer, account team, and partners to orchestrate a roadmap for implementation.; Drive technical assessments to create a map of the current landscape and to build the technical migration plans, thus building a solid migration business case.; Design the solution using your technical knowledge, architectural approach, consultancy skills and our methodology to win a customer’s technical decision and meet the customer’s needs.; Ensure technical decision makers agree with proposed architecture and on the migration plan.; Drive Proof of Concepts (POC) and Minimal Viable Products (MVP).; Scale through partners, acting as liaison between the partner and account team, facilitating partner resources and processes; supporting partner technical capacity by identifying skill and resource gaps and providing feedback to internal teams.; Be the Voice of Customer to share insights and best practices, connect with the Engineering team to remove key blockers and drive product improvements.; Identify and Support the creation of new pipeline within customer engagements in collaboration with the Specialist.

Company: PT. AQ Business Consulting Indonesia (AsiaQuest Indonesia)
job_desc: This position involves creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, enhancing application monitoring and containerization, and strengthening cloud-native deployment. You’ll also build internal automation tools, collaborate with development and infrastructure teams, and participate in the entire delivery lifecycle. Adhering to development standards and addressing daily production issues is essential.; Requirements:; 3+ years of application deployment and operations experience on cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.); Experience creating and maintaining CI/CD pipelines; Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, etc.); Working experience with container technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, etc.; Experience with scripting languages such as Python, Bash, etc.; Experience with infrastructure code (Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible, etc.); Advanced troubleshooting skills and problem solving abilities; Communication skills to work collaboratively with team members; Project management skills(optional); Documentation skills; Experience in customer proposal/pre-sale; Experience with AI, ML and data lake implementation(optional); Experience in handling cases in English or Japanese

Job Descriptions:; You will be responsible for managing data flow, building data pipelines, and ensuring data is available in an optimal format for analysis. We rely on you to build reliable and scalable data solutions. In this role, you must have a strong understanding of data architecture, big data technology, and software engineering practices. Your goal is to help our company manage and utilize data effectively for better decision making.; Job Qualifications:; Bachelor's Degree (S1) in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related fields.; Proven experience as a Data Engineer.; Experience in building and managing data pipelines (ETL/ELT).; Strong understanding of data architecture and big data technology.; Strong skills in SQL and Python.; Experience with big data tools and frameworks (for example, Spark, Hadoop, Kafka).; Experience with data warehouse and data lake (for example, Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake).; Strong problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.; Key Responsibilities:; Building and maintaining a scalable and reliable data infrastructure.; Develop and manage data pipelines (ETL/ELT) to integrate data from various sources.; Optimize data system performance and ensure data availability.; Build and maintain data warehouse.; Automate data process and increase efficiency.; Monitor and solve problems related to data and data infrastructure.; Maintain clear and detailed documentation of data architecture, data pipeline, and data process.; Preferred Skills:; Expertise in using containerization tools (for example, Docker, Kubernetes).; Advanced knowledge of database security, backup and recovery, and performance monitoring standards.; Experience with implementing CI/CD for data pipeline.

Responsibilities:; Design, build, and maintain scalable and efficient data pipelines to collect, process, and store data from various sources; Work with cloud-based technologies (GCP) to manage and process large datasets; Develop and maintain data warehousing solutions for efficient data storage and retrieval; Ensure data security and compliance with relevant data protection regulations; Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues to ensure smooth data flow; Qualifications:; Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and SQL; Experience with data warehousing solutions such as BigQuery; Familiarity with ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) processes and tools is a plus; Knowledge of cloud platforms and services for data storage and processing; Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail; Good communication and teamwork abilities

Job Description; Design, develop, and maintain data transformation processes to cleanse, transform, and aggregate data within the data warehouse.; Optimize and streamline data workflows to ensure efficient data processing and storage in the data warehouse.; Collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and implement appropriate data transformations.; Develop and maintain data warehouse schemas, tables, and views to support reporting and analytics needs.; Implement data governance policies and standards to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.; Monitor data warehouse performance, troubleshoot issues, and optimize for scalability and efficiency.; Requirement; Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Informatics Engineering, or a related field with data processing.; 2+ years of professional experience as a Data Engineer or similar role, with a focus on data warehousing, data pipelining, modeling, and transformation.; Proficiency in Python and SQL for data extraction, transformation, and analysis.; Proficiency in Tableau Desktop and Tableau Server, including advanced knowledge of dashboard development, data blending, calculated fields, parameters, and filters.; Experience with application orchestration, Docker and Kubernetes; Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts, methodologies, and best practices.; Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud Platform for deploying and managing data pipelines; Experience with cloud data warehouses such as: Google BigQuery and Snowflake.; Understand with data modelling techniques including dimensional modelling, star schema design, and slowly changing dimension (SCD).; Have knowledge of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and tools to efficiently extract data from various sources, transform it, and load it into the data warehouse.; Familiarity with data quality assurance techniques and tools to ensure data accuracy, consistency, and completeness.; Ability to collaborate effectively with business and technical counterparts to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.; Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.; Excellent communication and documentation skills to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.; Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment, managing multiple tasks and priorities effectively

Job Description; Develop ETL/ELT pipelines using tools like AWS Glue, Airflow, or DBT.; Integrate data from APIs, databases, files, and streams into data lakes or warehouses.; Deliver analytics- ready datasets with strong SQL and schema design (Star/Snowflake).; Maintain data quality using validation tools such as Great Expectations or Collibra.; Optimize infrastructure with Redshift, BigQuery. Job Description; Build and manage infrastructure using Alibaba Cloud services (ECS, OSS, SLB, RDS, VPC, RAM, Function Compute) and AWS services (EC2, S3, ELB, RDS, VPC, IAM, Lambda); Use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, AWS CloudFormation, or Alibaba Resource Orchestration Service (ROS); Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI, AWS CodePipeline); Manage containers (Docker) and orchestration with ECS and Kubernetes (ACK/EKS); Implement role-based access control (RBAC) using IAM (AWS) and RAM (Alibaba Cloud); Configure data encryption, firewall, WAF, and audit logging; Utilize monitoring services like AWS CloudWatch and Alibaba CloudMonitor; Troubleshoot system issues and perform performance optimization; Monitor cloud service usage and provide cost optimization recommendations; Use tools like AWS Trusted Advisor and Alibaba Cloud Cost Management; Create technical documentation, system architecture, and operational procedures; Collaborate with development, security, and other infrastructure teams; Manage and monitor internal networks and system connectivity; Assist with configuration and maintenance of cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure); Support real-time system deployment and monitoring processes; Assist the team in setting up VPN, firewalls, and basic security configurations; Handle troubleshooting of network, server, and cloud resources; Requirements; Minimum of 3 years of experience; Hands-on experience with core Alibaba Cloud and AWS services; Proficient in Linux operating systems; Experience in scripting using Bash and/or Python; Experience with automation tools such as Ansible, Terraform, or similar; Strong troubleshooting skills and deep understanding of networking, load balancing, and distributed systems; Good communication and collaboration skills

Responsibilities:; Developing and managing data pipelines solutions for the organization; Develop and execute database queries and conduct analyses; Generate reports, dashboards, and visualizations to present findings to stakeholders and support data-driven decision-making;  Requirements:; Strong English communication skills; interviews and meetings will be conducted in English.; Willing to work on-site at the South Jakarta office.; Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field.; Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience in data engineering.; Solid knowledge of ETL processes, data warehousing, and data engineering best practices.; Proficient in Azure Data Factory, Snowflake, Python, MS SQL, and stored procedures.; Experienced in data migration across various systems and sources.; Skilled in using BI tools, especially Power BI.; Familiarity with SAP CPI, SNPGlue, and BizTalk is a plus.; Proven ability to develop and manage data integration between systems or external parties.;  Why join Us?; We offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.; Most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large IT environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.; You will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.; Last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. Here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill.

Job Description:; Responsible for deploying and managing cloud environments.; Troubleshoots issues regarding cloud environments; Document issues and interactions with customers.; Collaborate with other cloud engineers.; Requirements :; At least 1 year experience in any of Public Cloud provider e.g Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google GCP or Alibaba Cloud.; Experience in deploying resources on Public Cloud (VM, VPC, IAM, etc); ⁠Experience in Linux os administration.; Experience in Bash script or any programming language; Exposure in Terraform/IaC.; Exposure in Docker/Container/Kubernetes.; Exposure in CI/CD process.; Strong problem-solving skills.; Attention to details.

What is Shipper:; Shipper is Indonesia's leading digital logistics company, specializing in end-to-end supply chain solutions for e-commerce businesses and enterprises. Established in 2017, Shipper is on a mission to democratize top-tier logistics across Indonesia. We are backed by prominent investors, including Naspers, Floodgate, Y-Combinator, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Insignia Ventures Partners, DST Global Partners, and Sequoia Capital India.; ; About The Role: ; We’re on the lookout for a Data Engineer (or Data Analyst Engineer) to join our growing tech team. You’ll play a key role in building our data pipeline from scratch, ensuring data flows smoothly across systems to support real-time operations and critical business decisions. This isn’t just about ETL — we need someone who can design, build, and scale. If you've ever walked into a company with no data infra and built something others could rely on, we’d love to hear from you.; Tech Stack You’ll Work With:; BigQuery, Google Cloud Storage, AWS S3; Apache Airflow, Database Migration Service (DMS); Databricks, Python; Familiarity with datalake architectures and storage optimization; Optional nice-to-have: Kafka, dbt, PostgreSQL, MongoDB; ; What Will You Do:; Build and maintain scalable data pipelines to support both batch and near real-time needs.; Integrate data from operational systems into our BigQuery warehouse.; Set up workflows and scheduling using Airflow.; Handle database replication and transformation via DMS.; Use Databricks for large-scale data processing.; Manage and optimize data storage layers, including AWS S3, GCS, and datalake environments.; Collaborate with engineers, analysts, and product teams to understand and fulfill data needs; What Are The Requirements:; 5+ years of experience in Data Engineering or similar roles.; Hands-on experience building pipelines from scratch.; Strong grasp of cloud-based data platforms, especially GCP and AWS.; Proficient in Python for automation and transformation tasks.; Able to work independently and provide direction in a fast-moving environment

Job Description; Design, build, and maintain robust and scalable data pipelines (ETL/ELT) using modern tools and technologies.; Integrate data from internal and external sources, ensuring data integrity and reliability.; Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and business teams to understand data needs and deliver efficient solutions.; Develop and maintain data models and data warehouses/lakes to support business intelligence and analytics.; Optimize data systems for performance, scalability, and cost efficiency.; Implement data quality checks, monitoring, and alerting systems.; Ensure data privacy, security, and compliance with regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).; Document data pipelines, architecture, and processes clearly and consistently.; Minimum Qualifications; 3+ years of experience in a Data Engineer or similar data-centric role.; Strong experience with SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) for ETL development, deployment, and maintenance.; Proven ability to design, build, and manage ETL pipelines using SSIS.; Hands-on experience with Power BI for building reports, dashboards, and data visualizations.; Solid knowledge of T-SQL and working with SQL Server databases.; Understanding of data quality, data governance, and data lineage concepts.; Familiarity with performance tuning and optimization of ETL processes and SQL queries.

We are SmartCyber, member of Cybertrend, one of the leader data science consultants in Indonesia. We believe as a company that can unlock its full performance capacity and for this purpose we need you to join us.; About the Role; As CLOUD DATA ENGINEER, you will be part of the core team, in ensuring that our product and solution delivered to customers are designed and developed with highly scalable, reliable and maintainable system. As a Cloud Data Engineer, you will responsible for expanding and optimizing data and pipeline architectures, and for enhancing data collection and flow across functional teams.; We are looking someone with:; A bachelor’s degree in Information Technology or similar field is preferred; Knowledge and proven track record experience with Cloud Data Warehouse technologies; Experience in data engineering and cloud data processing services (AWS, GCP or Azure); Experience building, cloud data migration and optimizing cloud big data data pipelines, architectures, and data sets; Good understanding of ETL tools and experience in Big Data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Data Bricks, Snowflake); The work you’ll do:; Work along-side customers to delivery data warehouse migrations leveraging best-in-breed technology tooling; Design and build cloud data driven solutions for enterprise data warehouse and data lakes; Develop scalable and easy to understand data pipelines and data management integration solutions; Research, test and measure different optimization techniques, new technologies (e.g. data streaming) and advanced features of existing technologies (e.g. data warehouse configuration) aimed at speeding up data pipelines; What Cybertrend can offer you:; The unique opportunity to work within data science and artificial intelligence solution for various industries – real world data science, AI , Data Management and Governance experiences; Investment in your personal growth and skill development (clear career paths, mentorship and coaching, learning development, etc); Attractive compensation and benefits packages; An open-minded culture with innovative, autonomous teams; A clear set of company core values that guide everything we do: GROWTH mindset, SOLUTION oriented, INNOVATIVE achiever, COMPASSIONATE, GOTONG ROYONG and Cool & FUN

The Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team plays a critical role in conducting close-loop data-driven business iterations. As business intelligence specialists and data analysts, our scope of work is not limited to just performance monitoring and reporting, but also in proactively finding actionable insights to help drive high-impact business changes. Our end-to-end data solution reduces the gap between the business teams and technical teams, and achieves real ‘intelligence’ in the iteration cycle. Browse our Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.; Job Description:; Work closely with Data PM, Business Intelligence Analyst & other Engineers to turn data into information that can be used to make sound business decisions; Design and develop data marts and data warehouses that support business intelligence and data analytics initiatives.; Develop and implement best practices for data management, including data quality, data security, and data privacy.; Handle end to end data pipelines from multiple sources internally and externally and ensure its performance & scalability as Single Source of Truth; Adhere to software development best practices, including test-driven development.; Requirements:; Master's or bachelor degree in Computer Science/ Information Systems or any related fields; Expert in SQL, Spark, HDFS, and other data processing tools; Expert in Object Oriented & Functional Programming (preferably Python / Scala); Experience in UNIX environment; Proficient in data modeling concepts (preferably Kimball’s versions), batch processing and lambda architecture; Proficient in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) including code version control, test driven development and technical documentation; Excellent communication & collaboration skills; Analytical & data driven and have high curiosity with data; Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining data pipelines, processing systems, and data warehousing solutions that power our analytics and business intelligence applications.; Qualifications:; 1+ years of experience in software development, with a focus on data engineering and big data technologies.; Proficiency in SQL and experience with PostgreSQL/ ClickHouse.; Comfortable with Unix-like OS.; Familiar with Bash/Shell Scripting.; Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and database design.; Information:; Full Remote, but must be willing to attend on-site coordination meetings if required.; Office location: Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta.

Job Requirements:; • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.; • Minimum 2 years of experience managing cloud-based networking (Alibaba Cloud, AWS, Azure, or GCP).; • Strong understanding of cloud architecture, networking, and security best practices.; • Proficiency in infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform, Ansible, or similar.; • In-depth understanding of networking concepts: TCP/IP, subnetting, routing, NAT, VPN, DNS, and firewalls.; • Hands-on experience designing and implementing Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs), peering, and hybrid cloud networking; • Proven experience configuring and troubleshooting VPNs (IPsec, SSL), Direct Connect, or ExpressRoute; • Skilled in managing cloud-native network components such as security groups, network ACLs, route tables, and load balancers (ALB/ELB); • Experience implementing secure service-to-service communication, including Zero Trust networking or micro-segmentation; • Familiarity with network observability tools (e.g., VPC Flow Logs, AWS CloudWatch, Wireshark, or similar); • Scripting skills (e.g., Bash, Python) for network automation and connectivity checks; • Ability to troubleshoot latency, packet loss, and inter-region or hybrid connectivity issues; • Understanding of high availability, load balancing, and failover strategies at the network layer; • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.; • Excellent communication skills and ability to support cross-functional teams.; • Experience with containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes); • Networking or cloud certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, AWS Advanced Networking, or Alibaba Cloud Network Specialist; • Experience managing virtual firewall appliances (e.g., Palo Alto VM-Series, FortiGate) in cloud environments; • Understanding of service mesh (e.g., Istio, Linkerd) and its impact on east- west traffic within microservices; • Experience managing DNS across environments, including internal DNS and private hosted zones; • Familiarity with hybrid connectivity using MPLS, VPN over BGP, or dedicated interconnect solutions; • Knowledge of dynamic routing protocols (e.g., BGP) in a cloud environment; • Experience configuring traffic inspection, packet mirroring, or flow analytics for compliance and security audits; • Experience with DevOps tools and practices (CI/CD, monitoring, automation).; Job Description:; • Manage and implement Network on cloud platforms such as Alibaba Cloud, AWS, and other cloud services.; • Handle routine maintenance and Network upgrades or changes.; • Collaborate with the IT team to identify and resolve system security issues.; • Design and implement scalable and highly available solutions.; • Proactively identify and resolve network issues.; • Develop automation scripts for operational tasks.; • Apply DevOps practices to enhance efficiency and security.; • Ensure cloud system security through access control.; • Manage configurations to ensure system consistency and reliability.; • Provide technical support to internal teams regarding cloud network.; • Implement disaster recovery solutions and create recovery plans to protect data and business operations.; • Conduct cloud network capacity planning and cost optimization.; • Apply approaches such as risk management, clustering, load balancing, and failover strategies.

Are you a passionate data engineer ready to build the infrastructure that powers our insights and decisions? As a Data Engineer, you’ll transform messy, unstructured data into clean, structured datasets, craft pipelines that scale, and support cutting-edge AI and analytics. We’re looking for a dynamic team player to join us in turning data into actionable intelligence! ; 🔍 What You’ll Do:; Design, build, and maintain robust data pipelines across a range of internal systems and products.; Ingest, normalize, and structure large-scale data — from text and PDFs to audio, video, and web-scraped content.; Build scalable data infrastructure for AI model training, chatbot pipelines, and real-time monitoring.; Develop ETL/ELT frameworks supporting real-time dashboards, background tasks, and scheduled analytics.; Ensure data validation, logging, audit trails, and error reporting for QA & Compliance.; 💡 Who We Need:; Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field.; Minimum of 2 years in a similar role.; Experienced in E2E ETL processes for structured & unstructured data.; Experienced in building pipelines with Apache Airflow, Kafka, Spark, or similar.; Experienced in Web scraping with Selenium & proxies.; A self-driven, team player who thrives in a dynamic environment.; Excellent communication skills and a passion for solving problems.; Adaptive, proactive, and ready to take initiative.; 💻 Technical Skills Needed:; Programming: Python, Golang, Java; Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch for data warehousing and indexing; Strong understanding in REST APIs, web scraping, and asynchronous job queues (Celery, etc.).; Familiarity with cloud storage (GCP, AWS, Azure) and CI/CD pipelines (GitLab CI, BigQuery, S3/Glue, Azure Data Factory).; Tools: ELK, Grafana, MongoDB.; If you meet these requirements and you are looking for a new, exciting opportunity within a successful, growing company, then this role is for you!; Integrity Indonesia is an equal opportunity employer.; * * *; Integrity Indonesia is a foreign investment company that has operated since 2001 in Indonesia, and with established affiliates in Malaysia and Thailand. Our business is to provide services related to the Prevention, Detection, and Investigation of risk.; As a rapidly expanding company with a robust business plan, Integrity Indonesia is looking for self-motivated and results-oriented individuals with solid qualifications who enjoy the challenge to grow and succeed.

We are looking for a motivated and creative candidate who wants to improve while developing the most innovative solution in Digital Era. The position that we offer will give you a vast opportunity to be recognized as part of digital development team who provide solution to customer, so they’ll be able to leverage their business and collaborate with Digital Ecosystem.; Scope of Work : ; Collaborate with Accounts and Presales Teams to implement cloud solutions. ; Design, develop, and maintain modular cloud systems with a focus on data security. ; Address infrastructure vulnerabilities and streamline deployements ; Provide clients with customized cloud support and recommendations. ; Requirements: ; Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or any related discipline. ; Experience with Google Cloud Platform or Microsoft products. ; Fresh graduate with a minimum GPA of 3.00 are welcome to apply. ; Preferred certification : Microsoft Azure, AWS, or GCP. Skills:; Proficiency in CI/CD systems, SysOps, troubleshooting, analytical abilities, and strong communication and collaboration skills. ; Placement at Karawaci, Tangerang or South Jakarta.

On behalf of our client, an IT Consulting company that is looking to hire a Data Engineer position with details below; Responsibilities; Design, develop, and maintain robust ETL processes for data transformation, quality, and reliability.; Build and manage data platforms based on server clusters such as Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.; Utilize major cloud service providers (AWS, GCP, Azure) for data platform management.; Deliver high-quality, well-tested, reusable, and secure code in compliance; Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and translate them into technical specifications.; Ensure data integrity and availability for various applications and stakeholders.; Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines to ensure seamless data flow.; Continuously improve data engineering processes and practices.; Qualifications; Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related major.; Minimum of 2 years of experience as a Data Engineer.; Proficiency in development languages such as Python, SQL, or other relevant languages.; Extensive experience in building and managing ETL processes.; Strong expertise in building data platforms based on server clusters (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka).; Familiarity with major cloud service providers (AWS, GCP, Azure).; Ability to deliver high-quality, well-tested, reusable, and secure code.; Strong technical expertise with various data sources and data types.

Job Description; Design, develop, and manage data pipelines from various sources to data warehouses and MDM platforms using tools like Informatica and SSIS.; Build and maintain complex workflows, mappings, data quality rules, and transformation logic.; Develop solutions based on detailed user requirements and ensure successful testing, implementation, and documentation.; Troubleshoot and resolve data issues across pipelines and systems.; Generate automated reports and manage data transfers via Shell Scripts and FTP.; Modify and optimize existing logic in ETL processes, PL/SQL, and shell scripts.; Act as technical support in project teams, collaborating with internal and third-party stakeholders.; Document all project work, including data models, mappings, and technical solutions.; Participate in strategic planning and help improve data engineering standards and procedures.; Minimum Qualifications; Required:; Strong experience with Informatica MDM (Hub, Data Director, Admin, Provisioning, Developer Tools).; Solid knowledge of ETL/ELT design and development, particularly using Informatica or SSIS.; Proficient in SQL, Oracle PL/SQL, and working with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).; Hands-on experience with Shell scripting and generating automated reports to FTP.; Familiarity with API-based data integration and understanding of SDLC practices.; Ability to gather user requirements and turn them into technical solutions.; Preferred:; Experience with BI Tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or Qlik Sense.; Knowledge of data modeling (ERD, star schema) and experience building mock-ups or prototypes.; Detail-oriented with strong analytical and documentation skills.; Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).; Team player with strong communication and problem-solving skills.

Job Overview; The Cloud Engineer will be responsible for designing and overseeing the implementation of cloud strategies, architectures, and infrastructures. This role emphasizes creating secure, scalable, and resilient cloud solutions to meet business needs. The Cloud Engineer will collaborate with internal stakeholders, optimize cloud resources, and establish best practices in cloud computing.; Key Responsibilities; Design and build best-practice cloud infrastructures using leading Cloud Service Providers.; Migrate, configure, and manage containerized applications.; Develop migration plans and strategies based on business requirements.; Execute migration plans while minimizing disruption to business operations.; Ensure cloud infrastructure complies with security standards and regulatory requirements.; Implement and maintain monitoring systems for cloud infrastructure.; Automate infrastructure setups, deployment pipelines, and routine tasks to enhance efficiency.; Perform routine maintenance, including patching, updates, and troubleshooting, to ensure infrastructure health.; Monitor cloud usage and optimize resources for cost-effectiveness.; Stay current with advancements in cloud technologies and applications.; Professional & Technical Skills; Minimum of 3 years of experience as a Cloud Engineer.; In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in implementing and maintaining at least one Cloud Service Provider (GCP, AWS, Azure, or Alibaba).; Proficiency in scripting languages such as Terraform, Bash, Shell, or Python.; Experience with containerization and orchestration tools, including Kubernetes (K8S), GitLab, Docker, and ELK stack.; Knowledge and experience working with relational, non-relational databases, and caching solutions such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis.

About EY:; EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in Consulting and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.; We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.; At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture, and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.; The exceptional EY experience.
